text: The East Lancs Greenway was a single-decker bus, It had a step-entrance, It was built from 1991 to 1994 by East Lancashire Coachbuilders. The buses were Leyland National buses, they were rebuilded by East Lancashire Coachbuilders, it had new windows, new passenger doors, new front lights, new turn signals and and new grille and new bumpers. ==Gallery== File:National Greenway TIB4886.jpg|East Lancs Greenway before improvements File:Leyland National Greenway nearside.jpg|East Lancs Greenway after improvements File:A green Leyland National bus YPL 449T operated by London Country on route 460 via Farnham Rd, img 8704 (16196403112).jpg|Leyland National bus ==References== ==Other websites== *Greenway technical specifications Greenway Category:Step- entrance buses
title: East Lancs Greenway
